title: Vedic Period
description: The Vedic Age laid the foundations of Indian culture, philosophy, and society through the Rigveda, Yajurveda, Samaveda, and Atharvaveda.

title: Maurya Empire
description: Founded by Chandragupta Maurya, this era saw the unification of most of India and Ashoka’s spread of Buddhism.

title: Gupta Empire
description: Often called the Golden Age of India, marked by achievements in science, mathematics, astronomy, and art.

title: Mughal Empire
description: A powerful dynasty that left its mark with monumental architecture, art, and administrative reforms.

title: British Raj
description: A century of colonial rule that reshaped India’s economy, politics, and culture while sowing seeds of resistance.

title: Independence Movement
description: A national struggle led by leaders like Gandhi, Nehru, and Bose that culminated in India’s freedom.
